title: Over 100 countries vow to end deforestation at climate talks
content:
1. Over 100 countries vow to end deforestation at climate talks  Associated Press
  2. COP26: World leaders promise to end deforestation by 2030  BBC News
  3. Start your day here: World leaders pledge to end deforestation; it's Election Day in Va., N.J and N.Y.; Pfizer shots for kids are around the corner  NPR
  4. Tackling deforestation must be at the heart of our response to the climate crisis  The Guardian
  5. COP26 Leaders Agree to End Deforestation by 2030  The Wall Street Journal
